trans-unit.source: Pointer to a Unicode null terminated string that contains the codec name

seg-source.mrk: Pointer to a Unicode null terminated string that contains the codec name

target.mrk: Pointer to a Unicode null terminated string that contains the codec name

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a Unicode null terminated string that contains the path name of the DLL in which the codec resides.

seg-source.mrk: Pointer to a Unicode null terminated string that contains the path name of the DLL in which the codec resides.

target.mrk: Pointer to a Unicode null terminated string that contains the path name of the DLL in which the codec resides.

trans-unit.source: If the codec is not in a DLL, this pointer is 0.

seg-source.mrk: If the codec is not in a DLL, this pointer is 0.

target.mrk: If the codec is not in a DLL, this pointer is 0.

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a Unicode null terminated string that contains the name of the file format used by the codec.

seg-source.mrk: Pointer to a Unicode null terminated string that contains the name of the file format used by the codec.

target.mrk: Pointer to a Unicode null terminated string that contains the name of the file format used by the codec.

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a Unicode null terminated string that contains all filename extensions associated with the codec.

seg-source.mrk: Pointer to a Unicode null terminated string that contains all filename extensions associated with the codec.

target.mrk: Pointer to a Unicode null terminated string that contains all filename extensions associated with the codec.

trans-unit.source: The extensions are separated by semicolons.

seg-source.mrk: The extensions are separated by semicolons.

target.mrk: The extensions are separated by semicolons.

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a null-terminated string that contains the mime type of the codec

seg-source.mrk: Pointer to a null-terminated string that contains the mime type of the codec

target.mrk: Pointer to a null-terminated string that contains the mime type of the codec

trans-unit.source: Indicates the version of the codec

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the version of the codec

target.mrk: Indicates the version of the codec

trans-unit.source: Indicates the number of signatures used by the file format associated with the codec

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the number of signatures used by the file format associated with the codec

target.mrk: Indicates the number of signatures used by the file format associated with the codec

trans-unit.source: Indicates the number of bytes in each signature

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the number of bytes in each signature

target.mrk: Indicates the number of bytes in each signature

trans-unit.source: Pointer to an array of bytes that contains the pattern for each signature

seg-source.mrk: Pointer to an array of bytes that contains the pattern for each signature

target.mrk: Pointer to an array of bytes that contains the pattern for each signature

trans-unit.source: Pointer to an array of bytes that contains the mask for each signature
